Introduction.A Nitro Academy é uma escola online de p: Nitro Academy is an online school for vocational initiation projects for teenagers aged 12 to 17 through practical and stimulating projects guided by experienced mentors

HaveYouImagined.Já imaginou criar sua própria fragrância: Have you ever imagined creating your own natural fragrance or making your first online sale? At Nitro Academy, vocation is born through practice

OurApproach.Com projetos práticos, aplicamos conheci: Through practical projects, we apply knowledge to real-world challenges, such as creating a sustainable business or programming an educational game
OurApproach.Uma escola internacional onde culturas s: An international school where cultures meet
OurApproach.Na Nitro Academy, o intercâmbio cultural: At Nitro Academy, cultural exchange takes place between mentors from various countries and students from all over the world

Carousel.youtuber_desc: Dive into the world of YouTube and learn how to turn your ideas into amazing videos! Discover how to plan, record, and edit engaging content, as well as understand strategies to grow digitally. In the end, you will publish your own video about how teenagers use their time!
Carousel.science_desc: Have you ever imagined being a scientist and publishing your own discovery? In this course, you will explore and investigate your curiosities using the scientific method!
Carousel.book_desc: Did you know that anyone can write a book? Learn how to improve your writing skills in a fun and easy way!
Carousel.entrepreneurship_desc: You will be part of a growing virtual company and will conduct market research, marketing, sales, customer service, and explore practical entrepreneurship fundamentals.
Carousel.english_desc: What if learning English was more than just studying grammar? In this course, you will explore inspiring stories, participate in meaningful discussions, and test your knowledge with dynamic quizzes!
Carousel.realestate_desc: Have you ever imagined helping your family find their dream home or making smart real estate deals? In this course, you will learn how to research properties and evaluate prices!

Perks.Pagamento por matéria, horários adaptáve: Payment per subject, adaptable schedules, and international access.
Perks.Projetos estimulantes em áreas de intere: Stimulating projects in areas of student interest.
Perks.Preparação para vida profissional e auto: Preparation for professional life and self-knowledge, without competing with regular school.
Perks.Semana intensiva anual para integração e: Annual intensive week for integration and family networking

HowItWorks.title: How it works?
HowItWorks.payment_info: You only pay for the subjects you choose
HowItWorks.Você só paga pelas matérias que escolher: You only pay for the subjects you choose

OurGoal.Nosso objetivo é ajudar cada aluno a des: Our goal is to help each student discover their true calling at a young age, saving years of indecision and misguided choices.

Parents.Sabemos que a adolescência é uma fase de: We know that adolescence is a phase of choices. At Nitro, our children use their free time to explore interests, away from the distractions of social media. We offer a safe environment with monitoring and progress reports.

Faq.Acesse a nossa página de dúvidas frequen: Visit our frequently asked questions page
Faq.A Nitro Academy é uma escola online para: Nitro Academy is an online school for students aged 12 to 17 who want to learn beyond traditional school. With dynamic classes, small groups, and a project-based approach, our students develop creativity, leadership, critical thinking, and much more!
Faq.Turmas reduzidas, projetos práticos e um: Small classes, practical projects, and a modern approach. Here, you develop skills that traditional schools don't teach.
Faq.Mais autonomia, mais criatividade e mais: More autonomy, more creativity, and more preparation for the future.
Faq.Nossa abordagem é centrada no aluno Com: Our approach is student-centered. With practical projects, teenagers apply knowledge to real-world challenges, such as creating a sustainable business or programming an educational game. We don't teach for tests – we teach for life.
Faq.Haverá Semana Intensiva Presencial?: Will there be an In-Person Intensive Week?
Faq.Uma vez por ano, famílias de todo o Bras: Once a year, families from all over Brazil gather for an immersion week! Inspiring lectures, workshops for parents, and collaborative activities for students. It's a chance to connect with other families who value innovative education. Participation is optional.
Faq.Como saberei sobre o desenvolvimento que: How will I know about my child's development at Nitro Academy?
Faq.Os pais receberão relatórios mensais sob: Parents will receive monthly reports on the projects their child is developing at Nitro and their progress.
Faq.É necessário a presença do pai durante a: Is parental presence required during classes?
Faq.É possível a participação de crianças co: Is it possible for children with special neurological needs to participate?
Faq.Se os pais acreditam que o filho consiga: If parents believe their child can participate in a focused online class, create projects, or solve challenges, feel free to enroll your child.
Faq.Convite para Educadores - Faça Parte da: Invitation to Educators - Join Nitro Academy

teacher_dialog.description: At Nitro Academy, we believe that preparing young people for the future goes far beyond guaranteeing a livelihood. We are building a school where learning is a journey of discovering vocations, talents and purpose - not just for individual benefit, but as a true service to society.

Faq.É algo que a Nitro Academy veio solucion: This is something Nitro Academy came to solve, transforming adolescents' (12-17 years) free time into talent.
Faq.Exemplos de projetos já estruturados na: Examples of established projects at Nitro Academy:
Faq.Estagiando como Youtuber, Fazendo sua Pr: Interning as a Youtuber, Making your First Online Sale, Creating your Own Perfume, Creating a Cinematic Script
Faq.Somos uma escola online de projetos de i: We are an online vocational initiation project school and we are looking for professionals passionate about education who have practical experience in their professional fields to act as mentors.
If this proposal appeals to you, come and be part of Nitro Academy. The first step is to complete this form:

AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.foundation: Nitro Academy was founded by us (Vahid Sherafat and Samareh Shams Sherafat) with the intention of offering complementary education to school for our children Mona Yasmin (13 years old) and Dayyan (11 years old) after realizing the urgent need to offer innovative complementary education after finding that our children were wasting precious time on electronic games and social media, without fully developing their creative and professional potential.
AboutUs.inspiration: From this simple intention, we were inspired by some references to expand the purpose of this school:
AboutUs.quote1: Consider man as a mine rich in gems of inestimable value. Education can, alone, cause it to reveal its treasures, and enable mankind to benefit therefrom.
AboutUs.quote2: The earth is but one country, and mankind its citizens
AboutUs.quote3: The best of men are they that earn their livelihood by their calling and spend upon themselves and upon their kindred for the love of God, the Lord of all worlds.
AboutUs.quote4: All men have been created to carry forward an ever-advancing civilization.
AboutUs.nobleCreation: We assume that each of us was created noble and with countless virtues, capabilities and talents that need to be awakened and stimulated.
AboutUs.internationalSchool: Our school has mentors and students from all over the world, making it an international school.
AboutUs.professionalJourney: Starting a journey of preparation for the professional future is not synonymous with seeking wealth or sustenance. We are promoting a school that develops students to discover their vocations and talents not only to ensure their sustenance but mainly as a form of service to society.
AboutUs.civilizationAdvancement: We want to stimulate each one not only to develop and evolve, but also to contribute to the advancement of human civilization.
AboutUs.dailyDedication: Every day, we dedicate ourselves to continuously improving what we do.

vahid.name: Vahid Sherafat
vahid.desc: Computer engineer graduated from Unicamp, specialized in Artificial Intelligence, serial entrepreneur, co-founder of ClassApp and Escolas Exponenciais, acted as CEO, CTO and advisor to educational institutions.

samareh.name: Samareh Sherafat
samareh.desc: Graduated in International Relations from Facamp and has previous experience as a teacher, headhunter and human resources leader. She was a volunteer in Gambia, Guinea Bissau and Israel in social projects.

barbara.name: Bárbara de Padua
barbara.desc: Publicity and Advertising student at Uninter, has previous experience with customer service and development of new projects.

allan.name: Allan Santos
allan.desc: Computer Engineer with a degree from Unimetrocamp, possessing experience in software development and web and mobile technology solutions.

cecilia.comment: The teacher interacts a lot, it was great!

alessandra.comment: She loved the class! The teacher was very dynamic and fun

anne.name: Anne
anne.comment: It was a very interesting experience that I highly recommend.

gabrielle.name: Gabrielle
gabrielle.comment: It will definitely meet your expectations!! If you are curious and want to know how things happen, here you will find all of this and more.

julia.name: Julia
julia.comment: It's a very good course for those who want to learn more about self-care, whether through better habits or homemade recipes.

leonardo.name: Leonardo
leonardo.comment: Initially I thought the course wouldn't have great effects, however, from the first class I realized that if you are willing to listen to the teacher, the course will fulfill its objective. My studies, organization and mindset changed very positively. So I thank Nitro for offering this course to my school.

marina.name: Marina
marina.comment: The Cooking and Nutrition course has an incredible mentor who shows students the versatility of food, how our body processes work when ingesting food and how to use this knowledge in everyday life. Very cool!

miguel.name: Miguel
miguel.comment: Do it without thinking, it will be worth it in the future.

karina.name: Karina
karina.comment: She felt more responsible in doing the classes and activities. And she matured in this sense

livia.name: Livia

waldemar.name: Waldemar
waldemar.comment: Improvement in task organization and studies

claudiana.name: Claudiana
claudiana.comment: My daughter felt extremely happy and gained more knowledge when taking Professor Carol Viesi's course, she always ventures much more in the kitchen!

ricardo.name: Ricardo

jamila.name: Jamila
jamila.comment: Excellent, every class he comes to tell me a little about what he learned, how well the teacher explains and how he is managing to apply the learning in everyday life.

MoreInfo.title: Nitro Academy
MoreInfo.subtitle: Transforming teenagers into protagonists of their future.

full_text.p1: Nowadays, teenagers live immersed in technology, surrounded by social media, games, movies, series, and ever-growing digital distractions. As a result, anxiety, immediacy, and difficulty in staying focused on activities that require consistency and purpose also increase. Many families are concerned about this scenario, especially in a world that is constantly changing, driven by the rapid advancement of technology. These are parents who want more than traditional school education; they seek educational, enjoyable alternatives aligned with today's reality, but face the challenge of finding solutions that truly fit their children's routines and interests.
full_text.p2: Nitro Academy was founded precisely for these reasons, by two parents who saw their own children wasting precious time on screens. Nitro offers online, synchronous mentorships with experienced professionals, courses that respect each teenager's interests, and projects that develop essential future skills such as creativity, autonomy, critical thinking, and teamwork. Among the courses offered are current and relevant topics such as leadership, communication, entrepreneurship, photography, nutrition, and health — all connected to the real world and aimed at awakening each teenager's potential. More than assisting in choosing a college major, Nitro helps teenagers find their path with purpose, using their talents to contribute to society.

screens.title: Excessive Screen Time
screens.desc: Teenagers immersed in social media, games, and digital distractions that increase anxiety and immediacy.

purpose.title: Lack of Purpose
purpose.desc: Difficulty maintaining focus on activities that require consistency and the development of essential competencies.

education.title: Education that prepares
education.desc: A search for education that prepares for the professional future with courses that enhance regular schooling.
